mapper.sql: scid, resuest_id, vendor_id, CHILDREN1_TASK, CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_TYPE, CHILDREN1_REASON, CHILDREN1_AREA, CHILDREN1_LINEAR, CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_VENDOR, CHILDREN1_INNER, CHILDREN1_OUTER, CHILDREN1_AMOUNT, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pcms_showcase_source
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pcms_showcase_source (scid, resuest_id, vendor_id, CHILDREN1_TASK, CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_TYPE, CHILDREN1_REASON, CHILDREN1_AREA, CHILDREN1_LINEAR, CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_VENDOR, CHILDREN1_INNER, CHILDREN1_OUTER, CHILDREN1_AMOUNT, create_time) values (#{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Outer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into pcms_showcase_source
scid,
resuest_id,
vendor_id,
CHILDREN1_TASK,
CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME,
CHILDREN1_TYPE,
CHILDREN1_REASON,
CHILDREN1_AREA,
CHILDREN1_LINEAR,
CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME,
CHILDREN1_VENDOR,
CHILDREN1_INNER,
CHILDREN1_OUTER,
CHILDREN1_AMOUNT,
create_time,
#{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update pcms_showcase_source
scid = #{record.scid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resuest_id = #{record.resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vendor_id = #{record.vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_TASK = #{record.children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME = #{record.children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_TYPE = #{record.children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_REASON = #{record.children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_AREA = #{record.children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_LINEAR = #{record.children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME = #{record.children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_VENDOR = #{record.children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_INNER = #{record.children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_OUTER = #{record.children1Outer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_AMOUNT = #{record.children1Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update pcms_showcase_source set scid = #{record.scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resuest_id = #{record.resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vendor_id = #{record.vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_TASK = #{record.children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME = #{record.children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_TYPE = #{record.children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_REASON = #{record.children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_AREA = #{record.children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_LINEAR = #{record.children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME = #{record.children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_VENDOR = #{record.children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_INNER = #{record.children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_OUTER = #{record.children1Outer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_AMOUNT = #{record.children1Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: SELECT b.scid, c.vendor_name AS vendorName, b.CHILDREN1_TYPE , b.CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME, b.CHILDREN1_REASON, b.CHILDREN1_AREA, b.CHILDREN1_LINEAR, b.CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME, b.CHILDREN1_INNER, b.CHILDREN1_OUTER FROM pcms_item_relation a LEFT JOIN pcms_showcase_source b ON a.relation_id = b.scid LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier c ON b.vendor_id=c.vendor_id WHERE a.itid = #{itid}
